member.name: T:WebApiDoodle.Web.Controllers.ComplexTypeAwareActionSelector
member.summary: Reflection based action selector based on ApiControllerActionSelector implementation. As the private parts cannot be customized, this action selector is very similar with CustomApiControllerActionSelector. We optimize for the case where we have an instance per instance but can support cases where there are many instances for one as well. In the latter case the lookup is slightly slower because it goes through the dictionary.
member.remarks: Most of the code has been taken from .

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No action was found on the controller '{0}' that matches the name '{1}'..

member.name: T:WebApiDoodle.Web.Controllers.ApiControllerBase
member.summary: Base APiController class which provides aditional two methods that run before and after the controller execution

member.name: M:WebApiDoodle.Web.Controllers.ApiControllerBase.OnControllerExecuting(WebApiDoodle.Web.Controllers.HttpControllerExecutingContext)
member.summary: The method which will run just before the controller execution. If this method sets HttpControllerExecutingContext.Response property to a non-null value, then the controller execution will be terminated and the given response message will be pass through.

member.name: M:WebApiDoodle.Web.Controllers.ApiControllerBase.OnControllerExecuted(System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: The method which will run just after the controller execution. If the returned Task{HttpResponseMessage} object is not in the RanToCompletion state, the povided HttpResponseMessage parameter will be null.
